documents.document: @tristandross @AbiWilks @femmenistfatale she's a dork
pivotal moment in my life this
@bain3z Used to go out with a girl from Birmingham who constantly said "Chhyyyyyz". Did my head in.
@bnmrsl still thinking about this
@tristandross @karlusss my exact words to her were "like, an i Robot type situation"
this was after explaining that i'd sleep with a robot if i could, but only if it was completely sentient.
tried explaining the word cuck to someone yesterday
Wait, there's a stand giving out free cheese balls, suddenly feel less like I'm wasting my time on this earth!!!
Can't wait to start going grey, but these powerful Asiatic genes don't falter, baby! ✊✊✊
Friend of mine, I beseech you: step into my DMs. They're always open.
@bnmrsl It's stuff like this that makes @bnmrsl twitter's best heel
@clonmacart really the nicest beach i've ever seen. proper unspoilt vistas and the sea just going on forever. i cant remember the name
@clonmacart when i went to portugal with my ex girlfriend a year or so ago, we took two hours to a beach so beautiful i literally cried
i know i need a small VACATION
david hockney phoning it in and doing a logo for the sun....mmmmm just lovely
@joolsd me, newly single, staring out the windows of my now too big bedroom as the blares in the background
They'll soon see how badly that works out!!!!!
Something galling about seeing ppl on south east housing co-op give moving in with their GFs as the reason their room is up for grabs
@charlesfare @KirbyAfua @cgoodhart89 @BeeBabs "they" "that" "their"...shudder
@KirbyAfua @cgoodhart89 @BeeBabs once had someone say to me "i love it when they do that to their hair" about some random kid they saw
@tristandross now that's paper!
@SamDiss i'm on a two kit kat/one nutigrain a day habit, i'm gonna gain a stone by the time i have my first appraisal
@joe_bish oh god yeah, this was when they opened a chilangos in camden - i would just suddenly find myself there every lunchtime, haunting
@joe_bish i've always been a disgusting gluttonous pig, but the abundance of free food is turning me into something much, much worse
i do have to stop eating sweets and fast food. I've just shoved a pack of haribo in my mouth 3 jelly babies at a time
@paulgibbins @joeabriggs @bnmrsl @YouTube big pop for this
@paulgibbins @joeabriggs @bnmrsl @YouTube fuck off did he?
keep sending me wrestling promos - the more melodrama and pathos the better
@joeabriggs @bnmrsl @YouTube honestly one of the most moving pieces of pop culture i've ever seen
@Kingkeir what's that?
this also is good https://t.co/wQYVsqJr61
sometimes i think, "nerds talk about wrestling so much, get a life". then i watch stuff like this and i understand https://t.co/Sqyjz0pzcI
@tristandross pal, as you can clearly see my DMs are wide open!
I saw @tristandross on his way to work this morning and I thumped him in the arm!
@bnmrsl alright tex!
Sir, I kindly ask that you step in my to DMs! 🎩
ba ba multicoloured sheep is such an old ass lie to peddle in 2017. do kids even still sing in school anymore anyway?
@GavinHJackson @AbiWilks i saw stan in the street today and thumped him on the arm
@AbiWilks who?
@CharlotteBHC @williamwasteman definitely doing it on purpose to be be provocative
fuck it i;m having the last two kit kats fuck off
@fudwedding the malice in this is palpable, can tell this comes from a real place
@karlusss we'll have to read the book, available now for 12.99, to find out! (i might actually)
@charlesfare @karlusss @theipaper like...what did he expect in the end?
@karlusss @theipaper seems so strange to me that someone who has suffered from heroin addiction would move in with habitual drug users

they call this "mallet pop"

@mmegannnolan they're delicious
office supply of kit kats running low. nutrigrain and popcorn have already gone.
@bain3z i'm listening to Boat Club!
guaranteed fave from my boy Bainesy on this one if he sees it.
your boyfriend went through a balearic pop phase in 2009.
@bnmrsl can you explain the rose west slade connection to me please
@joshuaolusa great show though
@AbiWilks i dont work from home, but constantly yes
@bain3z @LowQualityRegen @bnmrsl yeah i saw him in woolwich town centre like two weekends ago, just sort of walking around
you go back to a lad's house and he's got loads of hajime sorayama prints on his wall. How much sex do u give him?… https://t.co/0aGNxIcdMD
@bnmrsl went back to the weird run down bit of london i grew up in 2 weeks ago, saw keith from The Office wandering around the town centre
@CharlotteBHC Please don't hurt me Charlotte!! 🤐
San Junipero episode of Black Mirror is schmaltzy meaningless nonsense. https://t.co/oGtESpDgyf
@mmegannnolan this is very much how i live my life actually !
Everyone in The Walking Dead is a sociopath and an idiot https://t.co/oGtESpURpN

hot dogs for lunch today!!

@bain3z i'm trying to break into weird twitter, but the People love Classic Charles
@jmsclee i was hungry for milk i think
@ucrazyutaraptor @CharlotteBHC think i've only had soup twice in the four months since
honestly some of my best work, yet u cunts still retweet the fucking soup thing. this should be on 5k
@peatreebojangle also, it's a banana, which has slightly racist connotations in this context??
@bain3z @fudwedding @bnmrsl yeah this is why i try not to slag them off in public tbf
@charlesfare @joe_bish like, there's no way you could say that's not the grimmest most disgusting thing for someone to do or even make up.
@joe_bish as if!
Fucking despairing stuff Jesus Christ. What a horrible planet.
Terrifying looking guy as well, felt so bad for her. Went into the shops to get her some food etc, but she'd left by the time I got out.
People are fucking awful! Just saw a guy offering homeless woman sex in exchange for money. Told him off, for whatever good that does. UGH!
From righteous anger to thirsting over TV presenters. my brand is versatile, baby!
If I see that guy's, or anyone's, Jaguar again I'm going to piss on it, key it and shit on it.
On the phone complaining about a phone bill outside my office and a guy in his jaguar locks his car as I walk by it. Fuck off with that!!
@keewa @poundstoremike It's quite quiet, no one really talks much. It's near where the kettle is.
@vesticular how much is a coffee in a primark cafe?
@vesticular nice to get a bit of culture
i just want to be loved, fuck sakes
i hope someone gets me in this valentines thing!!
